summary: Add ScheduledEventId to PollActivityTaskQueueResponse to enable construction of idempotence keys for deduplicating side effects during activity task executions. The tuple of (RunId, ScheduledEventId) would be unique per activity execution.
userImpact: Users cannot currently construct reliable idempotence keys for activity task executions without access to ScheduledEventId, limiting their ability to safely deduplicate side effects.
proposedFix: Add ScheduledEventId field to PollActivityTaskQueueResponse message
keyQuote: The tuple of (PollActivityTaskQueueResponse.WorkflowExecution.RunId, PollActivityTaskQueueResponse.ScheduledEventId) is unique per Activity Execution
